tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE program_expenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_id INT,
  expense_category TEXT,
  expense_amount DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES budget_allocation(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE budget_changes (
 change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 program_id INT NOT NULL,
 change_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 change_date DATE NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES legislative_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE program_expenses (
 expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 program_id INT NOT NULL,
 expense_description TEXT,
 expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
 expense_date DATE NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES legislative_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE program_categories (
	program_id INT,
	category_id INT,
	PRIMARY KEY (program_id, category_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES legislative_programs(program_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES budget_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE program_expenditures (
	expenditure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	program_id INT,
	expenditure_amount DECIMAL,
	expenditure_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES legislative_programs(program_id)
);
